original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti

original: Kassa sampannaṁ na manāpaṁ, kassa sāduṁ na ruccatī”ti.
analyzed: kassa sampannam na manāpa kassa sādum na ruccati iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yāni kho pana tāni paṇītabhojanāni, seyyathidaṁ— sappi navanītaṁ telaṁ madhu phāṇitaṁ
analyzed: yāni khaḥ pana tāni paṇīta bhojanāni sappi navanītam telam madhu phāṇita

original: maccho maṁsaṁ khīraṁ dadhi. Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya
analyzed: macchaḥ masam khīram dadhi yaḥ pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānāḥ honti
gilāna pucchakāḥ bhikkhū gilāne bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjāma, tena no phāsu hoti;
analyzed: pubbe mayaḥ āvuso paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjāma tena no phāsu hoti

original: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti.
analyzed: idāni pana bhagavatā paṭikkhittanti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema tena naḥ na phāsu hoti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave gilānena bhikkhunā paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yāni kho pana tāni paṇītabhojanāni, seyyathidaṁ— sappi navanītaṁ telaṁ madhu phāṇitaṁ
analyzed: yāni khaḥ pana tāni paṇīta bhojanāni sappi navanītam telam madhu phāṇita

original: maccho maṁsaṁ khīraṁ dadhi. Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano
analyzed: macchaḥ masam khīram dadhi yaḥ pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇīta bhojanāni a gilānaḥ attano
yāni khalu pana tāni paṇīta bhojanāni iti

original: gosappi vā ajikāsappi vā mahiṁsasappi vā, yesaṁ maṁsaṁ kappati tesaṁ sappi.
analyzed: go sappi vā ajikā sappi vā mahisa sappi vā yesam masam kappati tesam sappi
tila telam sāsapa telam madhuka telam eraṇḍa telam vasā tela

original: gokhīraṁ vā ajikākhīraṁ vā mahiṁsakhīraṁ vā, yesaṁ maṁsaṁ kappati, tesaṁ khīraṁ.
analyzed: go khīram vā ajikā khīram vā mahisa khīram vā yesam masam kappati tesam khīra
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
yassa vinā paṇīta bhojanāni phāsu hoti

original: yassa vinā paṇītabhojanāni na phāsu hoti.
analyzed: yassa vinā paṇīta bhojanāni na phāsu hoti

original: Agilāno attano atthāya viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ attanaḥ atthāya viññāpeti payoge dukkaṭa
paṭilābhena bhuñjissāmi iti paṭiggaṇhāti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Agilāno agilānasaññī paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ a gilāna saññī paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agilāno vematiko paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ vematikaḥ paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agilāno gilānasaññī paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agilānaḥ gilāna saññī paṇīta bhojanāni attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
gilānaḥ a gilāna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
gilānaḥ hutvā viññāpetvā a gilānaḥ bhuñjati
